release.notes: * [mms] Add unit tests. * [mms] Add Horde_Stream_Wrapper_Combine::getStream(). * [mms] Add Horde_Stream_Wrapper_String::getStream(). * [mms] Fix documentation regarding proper license for this package (BSD).
* [mms] Fix possible infinite loop when reading from a combined stream.
* [rla] Upgraded to namespaced code complying with PSR-12 und PHPStan level 8. * |+
